name: The Escape of the Blorbs
description:
Welcome to The Escape of the Blorbs! 

You play as an unnamed hero who must save the world from blorbs trying to escape the internet.  

Click the blorbs as they appear and don't let them reach you. One hit and you're dead. 

Features: 

  • Snazzy Background Music
  • Simple one click controls
  • Sound Effects
  • Score System

This was a game made for Mini Jam 47: Internet. This is my first game ever finished, let alone released.  I had a lot of fun even if my game isn't the best of the jam (Let's be honest, It won't be).
